title: OCE Summoner Icons
body: Are there any plans on giving us summoner icons to show support for the OCE teams like Legacy, Avant Garde, Immunity, Chiefs, etc, etc? Even though our scene is kind of small, It would still be great to show support for our teams.

replies.body: Im with these guys. Why should we support overseas teams when we can't support our own teams.
I'd even pay approximately 13% more for RP to get my hands on a Dire Wolf summoner icon.
Give us OPL icons please Rito. I wanna rep Rich Gang and the Chiefs. In return I'll let you rape my wallet.

I don't know the OCE teams.
If we had icons though, I probably would.
They'd have more funding and more people would know them.
They'd be able to improve more...
We'd just really be supporting our Oceanic teams and I think that'd be good.
Yeah i wouldn't mind having this available id probably buy em
I want a dire wolf Icon so bad
I'd get the immunity one for sure

Put me down for a chiefs badge.

really cool way to get behind our local pro scene :)
I'd definetely buy a Summ Icon for Avant Garde. So yeah, +1
